thread.title: Delhi doctors use alcohol to kill tumour in pregnant woman | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Delhi doctors use alcohol to kill tumour in pregnant woman | Daily Mail Online

author: Priyanka Sharma
title: Delhi doctors use alcohol to kill tumour in pregnant woman | Daily Mail Online
text: The cure for cancer... BOOZE? Delhi doctors use alcohol jab to kill tumour in pregnant woman paralysed below the waist The results have now been recorded in the International Journal of Neuroscience The technique pioneered by AIIMS doctors was performed for the first time on a patient in an advanced stage of pregnancy The patient was brought to the neurosurgery department at AIIMS and diagnosed with 'vertebral haemangioma' Doctors decided to pump in a measured amount of 'absolute alcohol', a neuro-toxic drug, into the tumour to destroy the lump See more news from India at www.dailymail.co.uk/indiahome Published: 22:25 GMT, 13 February 2017 | Updated: 23:17 GMT, 13 February 2017 238 shares
